resources.string: Implementing algorithms on a computer often increases productivity
The individual who is most instrumental in creating a computer, as we know it today is John Van Neumann
Wireless data communications are 5th generation innovation in computing
3 Types of generations used to construct algorithms are sequential, conditional and iterative
The Leibniz wheel can carry out addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
Computer Science is the study of computers.
When an operation is unambiguous, we call it a primitive operation or simply a primitive of the computing agent carrying out the algorithm
All conceivable problems can be solved algorithmically.
The scope of a variable is limited to the block in which it is defined.
A variable is a named storage location in the computer\'s memory.
Algorithms are exclusive to the field of computer science.
Information after // is read by the compiler.
A method with a return type of void does not return a value.
